Class Deck

java.lang.Object
Deck
Direct Known Subclasses:
ActionDeck, BlueDeck, CareerDeck, HouseDeck, SalaryDeck
public abstract class Deck
extends java.lang.Object
This is the abstract superclass of all the card deck classes in the game. The deck is a container of any kind of game card. Card generation is not done by this class, but the classes that inherits from it.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.util.ArrayList<Card> cards
    This attribute contains the list of all cards in the deck.
    protected java.lang.String deckName
    This attribute contains the deck's name.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Deck​(java.lang.String deckName)
    This constructor initializes the deck's name and the cards' ArrayList object.

    This method simulates drawing a card from a deck, like how a stack data structure would work.

    • getDeckSize

      public int getDeckSize()
      This getter method returns the deck size.
      Returns:
      deckSize : int

    • getDeck

      public Card[] getDeck()
      This getter method returns an array version of this deck. This method is only used for debugging or MP demo to display the generated cards.
      Returns:
      deck : Card[]

    • drawCard

      public Card drawCard()
      This method simulates drawing a card from a deck, like how a stack data structure would work. This method removes the first card in the ArrayList and returns it.
      Returns:
      card : Card

    • returnCard

      public void returnCard​(Card card)
      This method returns the given card to the last part of the deck.
      Parameters:
      card - : Card to return to deck
